text: <@U02PJ44GW5B> Is it possible to programmaticaly ask HubSpot script to set or not set cookies in categories - in cases when you use an external cookie banner? Example: u are using a third party cookie management system, and u want to decide in the code at which point the system can begin to collect marketing cookies?
it would also be a good place to confirm custom functionality when `data-hs-ignore` is used. It seems like a custom approach is required when any vimeo or youtube embed is used
Has anyone integrated Microsoft Forms into HubSpot?
Hey Andrey! We're all at INBOUND right now, but we'll take a look at this next week when we get back!

we provide integration of microsoft to HubSpot
is there a way to clear all cache from blogs? I'm trying to run the HS cookie scanner but it's catching old cached modules

Question here

Our dev team has built a CMS to manage an e-commerce platform, but our customer has now started using HubSpot as a CRM. We feed all sales-related content into HubSpot, but the customer wants to view content information now, too, such as posted listings.

I suggest we create a sales pipeline with each type of posting as its own stage.

As listings become expired or are marked as sold, they change stages.

Is this the best way to feed the info from our CMS to Customer CRM? The goal is for them to have the best reporting opportunity.
